name: What Lies Beneath
description:
You're a penguin trying to make it from one platform to the other crossing very thin breakable ice. You can't swim as there are Orcas present and hunting you, be quick or risk being eaten!

This was created for the Unreal Engine 4 Winter Jam using the Theme "On Thin Ice".

Controls:

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A / D - Rotate Left/Right

Space - Jump/Dodge

There is a fun little bug in the game. Try to find it ;)

Team:

Illya Van Gils - Programmer

Derek Corimer - Programmer

Sara Leone - 3D Character Artist

Alexander Duda - 3D Environmental Artist & Whale Modeler

Henderick "Tidii" - Game Designer
